data.name: Arise: A Simple Story - Artbook
data.detailed_description: The Art of Arise A Simple Story is a dedicated digital artbook comprised of 110 pages of artwork from the team at Picollo Studio.
data.about_the_game: The Art of Arise A Simple Story is a dedicated digital artbook comprised of 110 pages of artwork from the team at Picollo Studio.
data.short_description: The Art of Arise A Simple Story is a dedicated digital artbook comprised of 110 pages of artwork from the team at Picollo Studio.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Turkish, Polish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Intel Quad Core
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 750M, 2 GB Memory
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
